Package com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class ServiceBindingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.ServiceBindingBuilder
  • public final class ServiceBindingBuilder
extends Object
    A builder class for binding a Service fluently. This class can be instantiated through ServerBuilder.route(). You can also configure a Service using ServerBuilder.withRoute(Consumer).

    Call build(Service) to build the Service and return to the ServerBuilder. 

    
 ServerBuilder sb = new ServerBuilder();

 sb.route()                                      // Configure the first service.
   .post("/foo/bar")
   .consumes(JSON, PLAIN_TEXT_UTF_8)
   .produces(JSON_UTF_8)
   .requestTimeoutMillis(5000)
   .maxRequestLength(8192)
   .verboseResponses(true)
   .contentPreview(500)
   .build((ctx, req) -> HttpResponse.of(OK));    // Return to the ServerBuilder.

 // Configure the second service with Consumer.
 sb.withRoute(builder -> builder.path("/baz")
                                .methods(HttpMethod.GET, HttpMethod.POST)
                                .build((ctx, req) -> HttpResponse.of(OK)));
    See Also:
    VirtualHostServiceBindingBuilder

      • requestTimeout

        public ServiceBindingBuilder requestTimeout​(Duration requestTimeout)
        Sets the timeout of an HTTP request. If not set, VirtualHost.requestTimeoutMillis() is used.
        Parameters:
        requestTimeout - the timeout. 0 disables the timeout.

      • requestTimeoutMillis

        public ServiceBindingBuilder requestTimeoutMillis​(long requestTimeoutMillis)
        Sets the timeout of an HTTP request in milliseconds. If not set, VirtualHost.requestTimeoutMillis() is used.
        Parameters:
        requestTimeoutMillis - the timeout in milliseconds. 0 disables the timeout.

      • maxRequestLength

        public ServiceBindingBuilder maxRequestLength​(long maxRequestLength)
        Sets the maximum allowed length of an HTTP request. If not set, VirtualHost.maxRequestLength() is used.
        Parameters:
        maxRequestLength - the maximum allowed length. 0 disables the length limit.

      • verboseResponses

        public ServiceBindingBuilder verboseResponses​(boolean verboseResponses)
        Sets whether the verbose response mode is enabled. When enabled, the service response will contain the exception type and its full stack trace, which may be useful for debugging while potentially insecure. When disabled, the service response will not expose such server-side details to the client. If not set, VirtualHost.verboseResponses() is used.

      • requestContentPreviewerFactory

        public ServiceBindingBuilder requestContentPreviewerFactory​(ContentPreviewerFactory factory)
        Sets the ContentPreviewerFactory for an HTTP request of a Service. If not set, VirtualHost.requestContentPreviewerFactory() is used.

      • responseContentPreviewerFactory

        public ServiceBindingBuilder responseContentPreviewerFactory​(ContentPreviewerFactory factory)
        Sets the ContentPreviewerFactory for an HTTP response of a Service. If not set, VirtualHost.responseContentPreviewerFactory() is used.

      • contentPreview

        public ServiceBindingBuilder contentPreview​(int length)
        Sets the ContentPreviewerFactory for creating a ContentPreviewer which produces the preview with the maximum length limit for an HTTP request/response of the Service. The previewer is enabled only if the content type of an HTTP request/response meets any of the following conditions:
        • when it matches text/* or application/x-www-form-urlencoded
        • when its charset has been specified
        • when its subtype is "xml" or "json"
        • when its subtype ends with "+xml" or "+json"
        Parameters:
        length - the maximum length of the preview.

      • contentPreview

        public ServiceBindingBuilder contentPreview​(int length,
                                            Charset defaultCharset)
        Sets the ContentPreviewerFactory for creating a ContentPreviewer which produces the preview with the maximum length limit for an HTTP request/response of a Service. The previewer is enabled only if the content type of an HTTP request/response meets any of the following conditions:
        • when it matches text/* or application/x-www-form-urlencoded
        • when its charset has been specified
        • when its subtype is "xml" or "json"
        • when its subtype ends with "+xml" or "+json"
        Parameters:
        length - the maximum length of the preview
        defaultCharset - the default charset used when a charset is not specified in the "content-type" header

      • contentPreviewerFactory

        public ServiceBindingBuilder contentPreviewerFactory​(ContentPreviewerFactory factory)
        Sets the ContentPreviewerFactory for an HTTP request/response of a Service.

      • accessLogWriter

        public ServiceBindingBuilder accessLogWriter​(AccessLogWriter accessLogWriter,
                                             boolean shutdownOnStop)
        Sets the access log writer of this Service. If not set, ServerConfig.accessLogWriter() is used.
        shutdownOnStop - whether to shut down the AccessLogWriter when the Server stops

        Decorates a Service with the specified decorator.

        R - the type of the Service decorator will produce

      • build

        public ServerBuilder build​(Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> service)
        Sets the Service and returns the ServerBuilder that this ServiceBindingBuilder was created from.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the path that the Service will be bound to is not specified

      • accessLogFormat

        public com.linecorp.armeria.server.AbstractServiceBindingBuilder accessLogFormat​(String accessLogFormat)
        Sets the format of this Service's access log. The specified accessLogFormat would be parsed by AccessLogWriter.custom(String).
